full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RAB TU GNAS PA'I CHO GA LAG LEN DU DRIL BA DGE LEGS RGYA MTSO'I CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,

colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @027B CES RAB TU GNAS PA'I CHO GA DGE LEGS RGYA MTSO'I CHAR BEBS ZHES BYA BA 'DI SNGA MO NAS DGE SLONG BLO BZANG PHUN TSOGS SOGS DED RANG GI ZHABS 'BRING BA DU MAS BSKUL ZHING, ,'PHRAL DU CHOS KYI RJE GSANG SNGAGS RAB @028A *, ,'BYAMS PA DPAL LDAN MCHOG SBYIN PA LA SOGS PA RGYUD PA DPON SLOB RNAMS KYIS MGRIN GCIG TU YID CHES SHING KHUNGS BTZUN PA'I RAB GNAS KYI CHO GA LEGS PAR BSGRIGS PA ZHIG DGOS ZHES NAN GYIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, ,RGYA BOD KYI RAB GNAS KYI CHO GA MANG PO'I DON KHONG DU CHUD PAR BYAS TE 'THAD CING LEGS PA'I CHA THAMS CAD RGYAS 'BRING BSDUS PA'I TSUL DU CHOS SMRA BA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, ,CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I GTZUG LAG KHANG DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG PHUN TSOGS KYIS BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
